about_the_game:
You are humanity’s last line of defense in this retro-inspired deckbuilder. Every hand brings you one step closer to victory against the waves of SPACE INVADERS!



Step onto the bridge of a Cannon class heavy frigate. Outsmart the invading forces and rival commanders all vying for HI-SCORE dominance. Rise up the ranks in this strategic multiplayer card game based on the iconic arcade classic.

The deck is yours, Commander!







SPACE INVADERS: Deck Commander is a fast-paced, strategic deck-builder.





You begin with a small deck of basic cards used to power your ship. Every turn you discover new action cards to customize your deck and form new strategies. Balance your deck to maximize your score multiplier and keep the INVADERS at bay. Create your own powerful action combos to outmaneuver rival Commanders and gain HI-SCORE. Be the first to take out the mysterious UFO to complete the wave and stop the invasion.





Compete against friends online to gain RANK and climb the leaderboards or you can practice offline against bots.






  • Dynamic deck building action for both new and experienced card players.
  • Discover new and powerful card combinations in every match.
  • Fast-paced gameplay perfect for quick action-packed sessions.
  • Take on your friends and enemies in ranked online matches for 2 to 4 players.
  • Online leaderboards where you compete with the world.
  • Practice your command skills and card combos against challenging bots.
  • More secrets to be revealed soon...





The INVASION is coming!

name: SPACE INVADERS: Deck Commander

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
